metadata.title: CVE-2008-5152 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: inmail-show in mh-book 200605 allows local users to overwrite arbitraryfiles via a symlink attack on a (1) /tmp/inmail#####.log or (2)/tmp/inmail#####.stdin temporary file.

criterions.comment: mh-book: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
